title: Random moments of not being able to move, ping, or send messages, then it all happens at once
body:
Video for reference! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pQYpd2sgC-k&feature=youtu.be

This has been happening to me recently, a lot. Like 10-15 times a game. My Soraka becomes unresponsive and my messages/pings don't go through. But then, outta nowhere, it all goes through at the exact same time. Both my messages and pings registered in 13:22 in the game simultaneously. My ping never, ever goes above 17 or 18 and my Internet is pretty good. I have no connection problems at all. Everything and everyone else in the game continues like normal (as you can see with my Kassadin ferociously battling Meowkai and Leona), it's just me. Help please! :c

replies.body: That almost looks like you're having some issues with packet loss. Essentially, packet loss happens when some of the data gets lost between your network and our servers. We should be able to know for sure by throwing your most recent game logs into our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743). Take a screenshot with Gyazo or Imgur and paste it here, then we can go over it together!

I was afraid of that! Most of the time these packet loss troubles have something to do with how your ISP is routing your connection to our servers, but we might still be able to help. Grab those logs again, and shoot them to our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they might be able to figure something out ^_^!

I replaced the asterisks that appear for lost packets with Xs since asterisks are not handled well on this forum.

Ooooooooh Comcast....I think that's all that needs to be said xD.

It looks like you might be having some packet loss as well since those pings are timing out constantly, so ahead and reach out to them in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as well to see if there's anything that can be done on either of our ends!
Thanks a lot. You're one righteous dude

This is not a problem on the client end, let me tell you that. We all have packet loss around 8%, I used the same log reader for 2 different connections/ISPs at 2 different locations, all of my friends have packet loss.

hi Celestine, I too am having random packet loss at least once per game I play. I have my internet through Charter and I would really appreciate it if you could look at my most recent log I uploaded. https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743

It says that I had a stable connection but I lose control of my character for a couple seconds usually once a game, so maybe you could still look into it. Thanks for reading!
